title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
the Map below. Save the other prisoners to complete Save the Gondians.

Search for Grand Duke Ravengard & Lead Ravengard to safety.

We reached Gortash's underwater command centre, also known as the Iron Throne. We need to find Grand Duke Ravengard.

You will need to reach the Grand Duke then make your way back within the amount of turns you are given. Once you reach him, the next interaction will go about with one of two ways, Mizora will either show up to help you or you will need to defeat he
